editorial.editors_note: Today’s frontier isn’t just about AI—it’s about *who controls it*: Musk’s audacious merger rewrites the rules of founder power, while OpenAI and Google race to redefine what’s possible at scale.
editorial.emphasis: Power consolidation in AI (corporate mergers + enterprise platforms) and the acceleration of *usable* frontier models (cost cuts, speed, and orchestration).

top_candidates.original_title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
top_candidates.generated_headline: GPT-5 and Ginkgo Bioworks Slash Cell-Free Protein Synthesis Costs by 40% Through AI-Driven Automation
top_candidates.summary: An AI-powered autonomous lab, integrating OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud platform, achieved a 40% cost reduction in cell-free protein synthesis via iterative, closed-loop experiments—marking a breakthrough in biotech efficiency.

top_candidates.original_title: D4RT: Teaching AI to see the world in four dimensions
top_candidates.generated_headline: D4RT: AI’s Breakthrough in 4D Reconstruction—300x Faster Than Prior Methods
top_candidates.summary: Researchers unveil D4RT, a unified AI model that achieves real-time 4D reconstruction and tracking with unprecedented efficiency, outperforming existing methods by up to 300x in speed.

top_candidates.original_title: Google's year in review: 8 areas with research breakthroughs in 2025
top_candidates.generated_headline: Google's 2025 Research Milestones: 8 Key Breakthroughs Unveiled in Annual Review
top_candidates.summary: Google's 2025 recap highlights transformative advancements across eight research domains, showcasing pivotal AI and technological progress that redefined the year's innovation landscape.

top_candidates.original_title: Gemini 3 Flash: frontier intelligence built for speed
top_candidates.generated_headline: Gemini 3 Flash Unveiled: Frontier AI at Unmatched Speed and Efficiency
top_candidates.summary: Google introduces Gemini 3 Flash, a cutting-edge AI model delivering top-tier intelligence with optimized speed and cost efficiency, redefining accessibility for advanced applications.

top_candidates.original_title: Community Evals: Because we're done trusting black-box leaderboards over the community
top_candidates.generated_headline: Hugging Face’s ‘Community Evals’ Challenges Black-Box AI Leaderboards with Transparent, Crowdsourced Benchmarking
top_candidates.summary: The post introduces *Community Evals*, a Hugging Face initiative to replace opaque leaderboards with open, community-driven model evaluations—prioritizing reproducibility, diversity of tasks, and collective oversight over centralized rankings.

top_candidates.original_title: How Elon Musk is rewriting the rules on founder power
top_candidates.generated_headline: Elon Musk’s Bold Move: Redefining Founder Power by Merging SpaceX and xAI
top_candidates.summary: Elon Musk consolidates SpaceX and xAI, potentially setting a precedent for a new Silicon Valley power structure, backed by his $800B net worth and unparalleled influence in tech and AI.

top_candidates.original_title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization
top_candidates.generated_headline: OpenAI’s Blueprint for Global AI: Localization Without Compromise
top_candidates.summary: OpenAI details its strategy to adapt frontier AI models to diverse languages, legal frameworks, and cultural contexts while maintaining rigorous safety standards, aiming for equitable global accessibility.

top_candidates.generated_headline: OpenAI Unveils Trusted Access for Cyber: Balancing Frontier Capabilities with Safeguards
top_candidates.summary: OpenAI's new trust-based framework, *Trusted Access for Cyber*, expands controlled access to advanced cyber tools while reinforcing protections against misuse—marking a pivotal step in responsible AI deployment for security applications.

top_candidates.generated_headline: OpenAI Unveils Frontier: A Scalable Enterprise Platform for AI Agent Orchestration
top_candidates.summary: OpenAI Frontier is a new enterprise-grade platform designed to streamline the creation, deployment, and governance of AI agents with unified context, role-based permissions, and compliance tools.

top_candidates.original_title: Veo 3.1 Ingredients to Video: More consistency, creativity and control
top_candidates.generated_headline: Veo 3.1 Unveiled: Elevating Video Generation with Consistency, Creativity, and Vertical Format Support
top_candidates.summary: Google's latest Veo update (v3.1) delivers more natural, dynamic video clips with enhanced creative controls—now including vertical video generation for mobile-first content.

stories.generated_headline: Google AI Unveils Project Genie: Interactive World-Building for Ultra Subscribers
stories.summary: Google AI's experimental prototype, Project Genie, allows Ultra subscribers in the U.S. to generate and explore custom, interactive worlds, pushing the boundaries of generative AI.

stories.original_title: Benchmark raises $225M in special funds to double down on Cerebras
stories.generated_headline: Benchmark Secures $225M to Amplify Investment in AI Chipmaker Cerebras, Nvidia’s Longtime Rival
stories.summary: Benchmark Capital, an early backer of Cerebras since 2016, has raised $225M in specialized funds to deepen its commitment to the AI hardware competitor challenging Nvidia’s dominance in the sector.

stories.original_title: From Svedka to Anthropic, brands make bold plays with AI in Super Bowl ads
stories.generated_headline: Super Bowl LX: How Brands Like Svedka and Anthropic Leveraged AI in High-Stakes Ads
stories.summary: Super Bowl LX showcased AI’s growing role in marketing, from Svedka’s first AI-generated ad to Anthropic’s competitive jab at OpenAI, marking a shift in how brands engage audiences with cutting-edge tech.

stories.original_title: Railway secures $100 million to challenge AWS with AI-native cloud infrastructure
stories.generated_headline: Railway Raises $100M to Disrupt AWS with AI-First Cloud Infrastructure
stories.summary: San Francisco-based Railway, a developer-focused cloud platform with 2M users and zero marketing spend, secured $100M to challenge AWS by building an AI-native cloud infrastructure.

stories.original_title: Claude Code costs up to $200 a month. Goose does the same thing for free.
stories.generated_headline: Free vs. Paid AI Coding: Goose Challenges Claude Code’s $200/Month Model
stories.summary: Anthropic’s terminal-based AI coding tool *Claude Code* costs up to $200 monthly, while open-source alternative *Goose* offers comparable functionality for free, spotlighting the cost divide in AI developer tools.

stories.original_title: The Future of the Global Open-Source AI Ecosystem: From DeepSeek to AI+
stories.generated_headline: Charting the Evolution: How DeepSeek and AI+ Are Reshaping the Open-Source AI Landscape
stories.summary: This analysis traces the rapid growth of global open-source AI—from foundational models like DeepSeek to emerging platforms like AI+—highlighting how collaborative ecosystems are democratizing AI innovation while posing challenges to proprietary dominance.

stories.summary: An overview of South Korea’s evolving privacy policies for AI and LLMs, highlighting regulatory measures to safeguard user data while fostering technological advancement.
